ARABIC: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord, forgive me and give me a kingdom the like of which will never be granted to anyone after me. Truly You are the Ever-Giving.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Saying: "O Lord, forgive me, and give me such a dominion as none will merit after me. You are the great bestower."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: “My Lord, forgive me and bestow upon me a kingdom such as none other after me will deserve. Surely You are the Bounteous Giver.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: saying, "Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom that no one after me can have the like. You are All-munificent".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “My Lord! Forgive me and bestow upon me a kingdom, which shall not befit anyone after me; indeed only You are the Great Bestower.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "My Lord! Forgive me, and bestow upon me a kingdom such as shall not belong to any other after me. Verily, You are the Bestower."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: My Lord! do Thou forgive me and grant me a kingdom which is not fit for (being inherited by) anyone after me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'My Lord, forgive me, and give me a kingdom such as may not befall anyone after me; surely Thou art the All-giver.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord! Forgive me and bestow on me sovereignty such as shall not belong to any after me. Lo! Thou art the Bestower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He prayed, "Lord forgive me! Grant me such power as no one after me will have -- You are the Most Generous Provider."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: my Lord! forgive me, and bestow on me a dominion which no one may obtain beside me: verily Thou! Thou art the Bestower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! Forgive me, and grant me a kingdom that will not befit anyone except me. Indeed You are the All-munificent.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said, "O my Lord! Forgive me, and grant me a kingdom which, (it may be), suits not another after me: for Thou art the Grantor of Bounties (without measure).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "My Lord! Forgive me, and bestow upon me a kingdom such as shall not belong to any other after me: Verily, You are the Bestower."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Forgive me my Lord, and give me a kingdom the like of which will not befall any after me, surely, You are the Giver'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord, forgive me, and grant me a kingdom never to be attained by anyone after me. You are the Giver.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:35] He said, ‘My Lord! Forgive me and grant me a kingdom that shall not belong to anyone after me, in other words, other than me (this [use of min ba‘dī to mean ‘other than me’] is similar to [Q. 45:23] fa-man yahdīh min ba‘di’Llāh, ‘who will guide him other than God?’). Truly You are the Bestower’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: My Lord! Forgive me) my sin (and bestow on me sovereignty such shall not belong to any after me) it is also said that this means: that will not be taken from me as the first time. (Lo! Thou art the Bestower) of sovereignty and prophethood to whomever you will.
